title: Tryst of Fate
description: Megan stumbles onto a private party in the basement of a club that won't let her in. A seductive stranger is more than willing to escort her inside...to "Fresh Meat Night" in a world of flesh and fantasy she barely knew existed.A peek into the VIP room has her thirsty to see more, but Derek warns her it's off limits to newbies. The next round of slave auctions is coming up. Megan has to decide if she's willing to do what it takes to be an exception to the rule.
author: J.V. Altharas
